personalInfo.name: Khairil rahman
personalInfo.title: FrontEnd Develover
personalInfo.bio: I am an Information Systems student with a strong interest in web development, committed to improving my skills and staying up to date with technology.

projects.title: Sobat Takwa
projects.description: Is a web app providing prayer schedules, Quran reading with audio, and daily prayers with search functionality, designed for ease and convenience.

projects.title: Aku Mahasigma
projects.description: A web app for searching and viewing student data from universities across Indonesia, offering a user-friendly and efficient interface.

projects.title: Age Calculator
projects.description: This is a basic web application that allows users to calculate their age based on their birthdate.

education.institution: State Islamic University Imam Bonjol Padang
education.description: Completed curriculum in information systems, including courses in data structures, algorithms, software engineering, ui/ux design. Worked on several projects, including a web application to manage inbound and outbound warehousing data.

Completed a Coursera specialization focused on building front-end web applications using javascript, React, and Node.js. Learned best practices for designing and implementing responsive, scalable, and secure web applications.
